packetMode.description:
Choose how player positioning will work.

Packet mode sends packet to server with the required precise position.

Script mode performs a sequence of actions that the player could perform manually, but does it a bit faster.
auto1e7.swiftsneak.exception.legs: [Auto 1e-7] You have a swift sneak enchantment on your leggings. Please wear it off before using positioning in script mode.
